data.text: That's the last one. The lessons only take a week, but that's kind of like if you really want to do that going into the future, that's kind of perfect that that's the last week because then you have time to develop your own course. And also on that one, we look at Wordpress and Weebly and Wix, so if you want to have your won dedicated website, those are really good tools to use. And also, if you want to teach synchronously, you want to teach live lessons, we show you how to use Zoom which is like Skype. You can also use Skype, but you can teach lessons online using Zoom and you can use Xoyondo to make appointments to create discussion boards and to create polls, so that's it. We got our A to Z of free.
